document_data.name: Barbed Orc Spear
document_data.mainbody: '''Barbed orc spears''' were [[polearm]]s created by [[orc]]ish smiths.
document_data.Description: Barbed orc spears were crude weapons. They had sturdy wooden hafts, topped with a cruel barbed spear head. When willed in battle, these barbed weapons dealt additional piercing damage to their targets.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, barbed orc spears were among many smuggled orcish-foged weapons provided to the looming army of [[Gorgomorz - Daggerford's Devil]] through his alliance with the [[Zhentarim]]. Many of these weapons were stockpiled in pirate smuggling sea caves in the [[Crab's Claw Coast]], southwest of Daggerford, shipped there on the ''[[Barracuda (ship)|Barracuda]]'', through the harbors of Daggerford.
